      • initEditorChoices

        private void initEditorChoices(FilterEditor editor)
        Initializes the choices in the given editor.
        It can update the mode of the editor, from ENABLED to ENUMS (in case of enumerations), and from ENUMS to DISABLED (for no enumerations)
